query.query: {"measures":[["unique","Percent"]],"pigql":"q = load \"ServiceOmniAgentWork\"; q = filter q by 'Status' in [\"Canceled\", \"Closed\"];curYear = filter q by {{cell(step_Selection_Time.selection, 0, \"Current\").asDateRange(\"date('RequestDateTime_Year','RequestDateTime_Month','RequestDateTime_Day')\")}}; comparePeriod = filter q by {{cell(step_Selection_Time.selection, 0, \"LastPeriodCompare\").asDateRange(\"date('RequestDateTime_Year','RequestDateTime_Month','RequestDateTime_Day')\")}};  b = cogroup curYear by all, comparePeriod by all; b = foreach b generate (avg(curYear.'SpeedToAnswer') - avg(comparePeriod.'SpeedToAnswer'))/avg(comparePeriod.'SpeedToAnswer') *100 as 'unique_Percent', (case when (avg(curYear.'SpeedToAnswer') - avg(comparePeriod.'SpeedToAnswer'))/avg(comparePeriod.'SpeedToAnswer') *100 < 0 then \"#f2536d\" when (avg(curYear.'SpeedToAnswer') - avg(comparePeriod.'SpeedToAnswer'))/avg(comparePeriod.'SpeedToAnswer') *100 > 0 then \"#3CAF6D\" else \"#7D98B3\" end) as 'color';","autoFilter":true}

{"pigql":"a = load \"ServiceOmniAgentWork\";a = filter a by 'Status' in [\"Canceled\", \"Closed\"];a = filter a by {{cell(step_Selection_Time.selection, 0, \"Current\").asDateRange(\"date('RequestDateTime_Year','RequestDateTime_Month','RequestDateTime_Day')\")}};a = group a by ('RequestDateTime_Year','RequestDateTime_Month','RequestDateTime_Day','RequestDateTime_Hour');a = foreach a generate 'RequestDateTime_Year'+\"~~~\"+'RequestDateTime_Month'+\"~~~\"+'RequestDateTime_Day' as 'each_date', 'RequestDateTime_Hour' as 'RequestDateTime_Hour', count() as 'date_hour_volume', unique('UserId.Name') as 'date_hour_agents_working' ;a= group a by 'RequestDateTime_Hour';a = foreach a generate 'RequestDateTime_Hour' as 'RequestDateTime_Hour', round(sum('date_hour_volume')/unique('each_date'),0) as 'Request Volume', round(sum('date_hour_agents_working')/unique('each_date'),0) as '# Agents Working';a = order a by ('RequestDateTime_Hour' asc)","measures":[[null,null,"Request Volume"],[null,null,"# Agents Working"]],"autoFilter":true,"groups":["RequestDateTime_Hour"]}

values: {"display":"YTD","Backlog30DayClose":"[\"current day - 395 days\"..\"current day - 1 year\"]","BacklogCompare":["current day - 1 year","current day"],"BacklogLabel":"Backlog Last Year","ClosedField":"'ClosedDate_Month'","CoGroup":"('RequestTime_Month')","Compact":[["year",0],["year",0]],"CreatedField":"'RequestTime_Month'","CreatedProjection":"created['RequestTime_Month']","Current":["current year","current day"],"FullGroup":"RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Month","GenerateClosedDate":"'ClosedDate_Year'+\"~~~\"+'ClosedDate_Month' as 'RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Month'","GenerateCoGroupDate":"created['RequestTime_Year']+\"~~~\"+created['RequestTime_Month'] as 'RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Month'","GenerateRequestTime":"'RequestTime_Year'+\"~~~\"+'RequestTime_Month' as 'RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Month'","GroupbyClosedDate":"('ClosedDate_Year','ClosedDate_Month')","GroupbyRequestTime":"('RequestTime_Year','RequestTime_Month')","Grouping":"RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Month","LastPeriodCompare":["current year - 1 year","current day - 1 year"],"LastYearCompare":["current year - 1 year","current day - 1 year"],"Measure":["Backlog","Count",null,{"display":"Backlog Count at Start of Month"}],"compactGroup":["RequestTime_Year","RequestTime_Month"],"filter":"year","queryCogroupNew":"first(ThisYear['RequestTime_Year'])+\"~~~\"+ThisYear['RequestTime_Month'] as 'RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Month'","SAQL":"coalesce((avg(ThisYear['Resolution_Time__c'])-avg(LastYear['Resolution_Time__c']))/avg(LastYear['Resolution_Time__c']),0)*100 as sum_Percent","trendProjection":"toString(now(), \"yyyy\")+\"~~~\"+toString(now(), \"99\")"}

{"display":"QTD","Backlog30DayClose":"[\"current day - 120 days\"..\"current day - 1 quarter\"]","BacklogCompare":["current day - 1 quarter","current day"],"BacklogLabel":"Backlog Last Quarter","ClosedField":"'ClosedDate_Week'","CoGroup":"('RequestTime_Week')","Compact":[["quarter",0],["quarter",0]],"CreatedField":"'RequestTime_Week'","CreatedProjection":"created['RequestTime_Week']","Current":["current quarter","current day"],"FullGroup":"RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Week","GenerateClosedDate":"'ClosedDate_Year'+\"~~~\"+'ClosedDate_Week' as 'RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Week'","GenerateCoGroupDate":"created['RequestTime_Year']+\"~~~\"+created['RequestTime_Week'] as 'RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Week'","GenerateRequestTime":"'RequestTime_Year'+\"~~~\"+'RequestTime_Week' as 'RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Week'","GroupbyClosedDate":"('ClosedDate_Year','ClosedDate_Week')","GroupbyRequestTime":"('RequestTime_Year','RequestTime_Week')","Grouping":"RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Week","LastPeriodCompare":["current quarter - 1 quarter","current day - 1 quarter"],"LastYearCompare":["current quarter - 1 year","current day - 1 year"],"Measure":["Backlog","Count",null,{"display":"Backlog Count at Start of Week"}],"compactGroup":["RequestTime_Year","RequestTime_Week"],"filter":"quarter","queryCogroupNew":"first(ThisYear['RequestTime_Year'])+\"~~~\"+ThisYear['RequestTime_Week'] as 'RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Week'","SAQL":"coalesce((avg(ThisYear['Resolution_Time__c'])-avg(LastYear['Resolution_Time__c']))/avg(LastYear['Resolution_Time__c']),0)*100 as sum_Percent","trendProjection":"toString(now(), \"yyyy\")+\"~~~\"+toString(now(), \"99\")"}

{"display":"MTD","Backlog30DayClose":"[\"current day - 60 days\"..\"current day - 1 month\"]","BacklogCompare":["current day - 1 month","current day"],"BacklogLabel":"Backlog Last Month","ClosedField":"'ClosedDate_Month','ClosedDate_Day'","CoGroup":"('RequestTime_Month','RequestTime_Day')","Compact":[["month",0],["month",0]],"CreatedField":"'RequestTime_Month','RequestTime_Day'","CreatedProjection":"created['RequestTime_Month'] +\"~~~\" + created['RequestTime_Day']","Current":["current month","current month"],"FullGroup":"RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Month~~~RequestTime_Day","GenerateClosedDate":"'ClosedDate_Year'+\"~~~\"+'ClosedDate_Month'+\"~~~\"+'ClosedDate_Day' as 'RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Month~~~RequestTime_Day'","GenerateCoGroupDate":"created['RequestTime_Year']+\"~~~\"+created['RequestTime_Month']+\"~~~\"+created['RequestTime_Day'] as 'RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Month~~~RequestTime_Day'","GenerateRequestTime":"'RequestTime_Year'+\"~~~\"+'RequestTime_Month'+\"~~~\"+'RequestTime_Day' as 'RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Month~~~RequestTime_Day'","GroupbyClosedDate":"('ClosedDate_Year','ClosedDate_Month','ClosedDate_Day')","GroupbyRequestTime":"('RequestTime_Year','RequestTime_Month','RequestTime_Day')","Grouping":"RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Month~~~RequestTime_Day","LastPeriodCompare":["current month - 1 month","current day - 1 month"],"LastYearCompare":["current month - 1 year","current day - 1 year"],"Measure":["Backlog","Count",null,{"display":"Backlog Count at Start of Day"}],"compactGroup":["RequestTime_Year","RequestTime_Month","RequestTime_Day"],"filter":"month","queryCogroupNew":"first(ThisYear['RequestTime_Year'])+\"~~~\"+ThisYear['RequestTime_Month']+\"~~~\"+ThisYear['RequestTime_Day'] as 'RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Month~~~RequestTime_Day'","trendProjection":"toString(now(), \"yyyy~~~MM\")+\"~~~\"+toString(now(), \"99\")"}

{"display":"Last 7 Days","Backlog30DayClose":"[\"current day - 37 days\"..\"current day - 7 days\"]","BacklogCompare":["current day - 1 week","current day"],"BacklogLabel":"Backlog Last 7 Days","ClosedField":"'ClosedDate_Month','ClosedDate_Day'","CoGroup":"('RequestTime_Month','RequestTime_Day')","Compact":[["day",-7],["day",0]],"CreatedField":"'RequestTime_Month','RequestTime_Day'","CreatedProjection":"created['RequestTime_Month'] +\"~~~\" + created['RequestTime_Day']","Current":["7 days ago","current day"],"FullGroup":"RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Month~~~RequestTime_Day","GenerateClosedDate":"'ClosedDate_Year'+\"~~~\"+'ClosedDate_Month'+\"~~~\"+'ClosedDate_Day' as 'RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Month~~~RequestTime_Day'","GenerateCoGroupDate":"created['RequestTime_Year']+\"~~~\"+created['RequestTime_Month']+\"~~~\"+created['RequestTime_Day'] as 'RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Month~~~RequestTime_Day'","GenerateRequestTime":"'RequestTime_Year'+\"~~~\"+'RequestTime_Month'+\"~~~\"+'RequestTime_Day' as 'RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Month~~~RequestTime_Day'","GroupbyClosedDate":"('ClosedDate_Year','ClosedDate_Month','ClosedDate_Day')","GroupbyRequestTime":"('RequestTime_Year','RequestTime_Month','RequestTime_Day')","Grouping":"RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Month~~~RequestTime_Day","LastPeriodCompare":["7 days ago - 1 week","current day - 1 week"],"LastYearCompare":["7 days ago - 1 year","current day - 1 year"],"Measure":["Backlog","Count",null,{"display":"Backlog Count at Start of Day"}],"compactGroup":["RequestTime_Year","RequestTime_Month","RequestTime_Day"],"filter":"week","queryCogroupNew":"first(ThisYear['RequestTime_Year'])+\"~~~\"+ThisYear['RequestTime_Month']+\"~~~\"+ThisYear['RequestTime_Day'] as 'RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Month~~~RequestTime_Day'","trendProjection":"toString(now(), \"yyyy~~~MM\")+\"~~~\"+toString(now(), \"99\")"}

{"display":"Last 2 weeks","Backlog30DayClose":"[\"current day - 14 days\"..\"current day - 14 days\"]","BacklogCompare":["current day - 14 days","current day"],"BacklogLabel":"Backlog Last 14 Days","ClosedField":"'ClosedDate_Week'","CoGroup":"('RequestTime_Week')","Compact":[["day",-14],["day",0]],"CreatedField":"'RequestTime_Week'","CreatedProjection":"created['RequestTime_Week']","Current":["14 days ago","current day"],"FullGroup":"RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Week","GenerateClosedDate":"'ClosedDate_Year'+\"~~~\"+'ClosedDate_Week' as 'RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Week'","GenerateCoGroupDate":"created['RequestTime_Year']+\"~~~\"+created['RequestTime_Week'] as 'RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Week'","GenerateRequestTime":"'RequestTime_Year'+\"~~~\"+'RequestTime_Week' as 'RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Week'","GroupbyClosedDate":"('ClosedDate_Year','ClosedDate_Week')","GroupbyRequestTime":"('RequestTime_Year','RequestTime_Week')","Grouping":"RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Week","LastPeriodCompare":["14 days ago - 14 days","current day - 14 days"],"LastYearCompare":["14 days ago - 1 year","current day - 1 year"],"Measure":["Backlog","Count",null,{"display":"Backlog Count at Start of Week"}],"compactGroup":["RequestTime_Year","RequestTime_Week"],"filter":"month","queryCogroupNew":"first(ThisYear['RequestTime_Year'])+\"~~~\"+ThisYear['RequestTime_Week'] as 'RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Week'","trendProjection":"toString(now(), \"yyyy~~~MM\")+\"~~~\"+toString(now(), \"99\")"}

{"display":"Last 30 Days","Backlog30DayClose":"[\"current day - 60 days\"..\"current day - 30 days\"]","BacklogCompare":["current day - 30 days","current day"],"BacklogLabel":"Backlog Last 30 Days","ClosedField":"'ClosedDate_Week'","CoGroup":"('RequestTime_Week')","Compact":[["day",-30],["day",0]],"CreatedField":"'RequestTime_Week'","CreatedProjection":"created['RequestTime_Week']","Current":["30 days ago","current day"],"FullGroup":"RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Week","GenerateClosedDate":"'ClosedDate_Year'+\"~~~\"+'ClosedDate_Week' as 'RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Week'","GenerateCoGroupDate":"created['RequestTime_Year']+\"~~~\"+created['RequestTime_Week'] as 'RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Week'","GenerateRequestTime":"'RequestTime_Year'+\"~~~\"+'RequestTime_Week' as 'RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Week'","GroupbyClosedDate":"('ClosedDate_Year','ClosedDate_Week')","GroupbyRequestTime":"('RequestTime_Year','RequestTime_Week')","Grouping":"RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Week","LastPeriodCompare":["30 days ago - 30 days","current day - 30 days"],"LastYearCompare":["30 days ago - 1 year","current day - 1 year"],"Measure":["Backlog","Count",null,{"display":"Backlog Count at Start of Week"}],"compactGroup":["RequestTime_Year","RequestTime_Week"],"filter":"month","queryCogroupNew":"first(ThisYear['RequestTime_Year'])+\"~~~\"+ThisYear['RequestTime_Week'] as 'RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Week'","trendProjection":"toString(now(), \"yyyy~~~MM\")+\"~~~\"+toString(now(), \"99\")"}

{"display":"Last 180 Days","Backlog30DayClose":"[\"current day - 240 days\"..\"current day - 180 days\"]","BacklogCompare":["current day - 180 days","current day"],"BacklogLabel":"Backlog Last 180 Days","ClosedField":"'ClosedDate_Month'","CoGroup":"('RequestTime_Month')","Compact":[["day",-180],["day",0]],"CreatedField":"'RequestTime_Month'","CreatedProjection":"created['RequestTime_Month']","Current":["180 days ago","current day"],"FullGroup":"RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Month","GenerateClosedDate":"'ClosedDate_Year'+\"~~~\"+'ClosedDate_Month' as 'RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Month'","GenerateCoGroupDate":"created['RequestTime_Year']+\"~~~\"+created['RequestTime_Month'] as 'RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Month'","GenerateRequestTime":"'RequestTime_Year'+\"~~~\"+'RequestTime_Month' as 'RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Month'","GroupbyClosedDate":"('ClosedDate_Year','ClosedDate_Month')","GroupbyRequestTime":"('RequestTime_Year','RequestTime_Month')","Grouping":"RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Month","LastPeriodCompare":["180 days ago - 180 days","current day - 180 days"],"LastYearCompare":["180 days ago - 1 year","current day - 1 year"],"Measure":["Backlog","Count",null,{"display":"Backlog Count at Start of Month"}],"compactGroup":["RequestTime_Year","RequestTime_Month"],"filter":"month","queryCogroupNew":"first(ThisYear['RequestTime_Year'])+\"~~~\"+ThisYear['RequestTime_Month'] as 'RequestTime_Year~~~RequestTime_Month'","trendProjection":"toString(now(), \"yyyy\")+\"~~~\"+toString(now(), \"99\")"}

query.query: {"measures":[["unique","Percent"]],"pigql":"q = load \"ServiceOmniAgentWork\"; q = filter q by 'Status' in [\"Canceled\", \"Closed\"];curYear = filter q by {{cell(step_Selection_Time.selection, 0, \"Current\").asDateRange(\"date('RequestDateTime_Year','RequestDateTime_Month','RequestDateTime_Day')\")}}; comparePeriod = filter q by {{cell(step_Selection_Time.selection, 0, \"LastPeriodCompare\").asDateRange(\"date('RequestDateTime_Year','RequestDateTime_Month','RequestDateTime_Day')\")}};  b = cogroup curYear by all, comparePeriod by all; b = foreach b generate (count(curYear) - count(comparePeriod))/count(comparePeriod) *100 as 'unique_Percent', (case when (count(curYear) - count(comparePeriod))/count(comparePeriod) *100 < 0 then \"#f2536d\" when (count(curYear) - count(comparePeriod))/count(comparePeriod) *100 > 0 then \"#3CAF6D\" else \"#7D98B3\" end) as 'color';","autoFilter":true}

{"measures":[["unique","Percent"]],"pigql":"q = load \"ServiceOmniAgentWork\"; q = filter q by 'Status' in [\"Canceled\", \"Closed\"];curYear = filter q by {{cell(step_Selection_Time.selection, 0, \"Current\").asDateRange(\"date('RequestDateTime_Year','RequestDateTime_Month','RequestDateTime_Day')\")}}; comparePeriod = filter q by {{cell(step_Selection_Time.selection, 0, \"LastPeriodCompare\").asDateRange(\"date('RequestDateTime_Year','RequestDateTime_Month','RequestDateTime_Day')\")}};  b = cogroup curYear by all, comparePeriod by all; b = foreach b generate (avg(curYear.'HandleTime') - avg(comparePeriod.'HandleTime'))/avg(comparePeriod.'HandleTime') *100 as 'unique_Percent', (case when (avg(curYear.'HandleTime') - avg(comparePeriod.'HandleTime'))/avg(comparePeriod.'HandleTime') *100 < 0 then \"#f2536d\" when (avg(curYear.'HandleTime') - avg(comparePeriod.'HandleTime'))/avg(comparePeriod.'HandleTime') *100 > 0 then \"#3CAF6D\" else \"#7D98B3\" end) as 'color';","autoFilter":true}

step_ValuesTable.query: q = load "ServiceOmniAgentWork"; q = filter q by 'Status' in ["Canceled", "Closed"]; q = filter q by {{cell(step_Selection_Time.selection, 0, "Current").asDateRange("date('RequestDateTime_Year','RequestDateTime_Month','RequestDateTime_Day')")}};q = foreach q generate 'Case.CaseNumber' as 'Case.CaseNumber','Name' as 'Name', 'Case.Account.Name' as 'Case.Account.Name','UserId.Name' as 'UserId.Name','SpeedToAnswer' as 'SpeedToAnswer', 'HandleTime' as 'HandleTime','ActiveTime' as 'ActiveTime','Case.Origin' as 'Case.Origin','Group.Name' as 'Group.Name','Status' as 'Status', 'Case.Product_Family_KB__c' as 'Case.Product_Family_KB__c';q = limit q 100;

query.query: {"measures":[["unique","Percent"]],"pigql":"q = load \"ServiceOmniAgentWork\"; q = filter q by 'Status' in [\"Canceled\", \"Closed\"];curYear = filter q by {{cell(step_Selection_Time.selection, 0, \"Current\").asDateRange(\"date('RequestDateTime_Year','RequestDateTime_Month','RequestDateTime_Day')\")}}; comparePeriod = filter q by {{cell(step_Selection_Time.selection, 0, \"LastPeriodCompare\").asDateRange(\"date('RequestDateTime_Year','RequestDateTime_Month','RequestDateTime_Day')\")}};  b = cogroup curYear by all, comparePeriod by all; b = foreach b generate (avg(curYear.'ActiveTime') - avg(comparePeriod.'ActiveTime'))/avg(comparePeriod.'ActiveTime') *100 as 'unique_Percent', (case when (avg(curYear.'ActiveTime') - avg(comparePeriod.'ActiveTime'))/avg(comparePeriod.'ActiveTime') *100 < 0 then \"#f2536d\" when (avg(curYear.'ActiveTime') - avg(comparePeriod.'ActiveTime'))/avg(comparePeriod.'ActiveTime') *100 > 0 then \"#3CAF6D\" else \"#7D98B3\" end) as 'color';","autoFilter":true}

parameters.text: Click on a day to view hourly volume breakdown below

This dashboard is designed for 
 desktop viewing only
Agent Performance by CSAT, Handle Time and Handled Volume
